titles.title: Susan B. Anthony Birthday Act
To honor Susan B. Anthony by celebrating her legacy on the third Monday in February.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E210)
Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 2/11/2011--Introduced. Susan B. Anthony Birthday Act - Honors Susan B. Anthony by celebrating her legacy on the third Monday in February.
